alert.note: Alert for Camden; Pasquotank; Western Currituck (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 6:25PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Camden, southeastern Pasquotank and southeastern Currituck Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 625 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Shiloh, or near Weeksville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, heavy rain, and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibilty and minor flooding possible. Frequent cloud to ground lightning strikes. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Old Trap around 635 PM EDT. Grandy around 705 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Coinjock, Riddle, Poplar Branch, Aydlett, Texas, Glen Cove, Bertha, Goose Creek, Bartlett and Taylors Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
